rules_text:
{3}: Integrate the top two cards of target player’s library. [i](Exile them, then you may choose nonland permanents they’re integrated onto.)[/i]
When Silverbone Chromate dies, you may sacrifice a permanent you control with two or more cards integrated onto it. If you do, return Silverbone Chromate from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
notes:
!canoncard Nimana Skitter-Sneak
 101: Integrating is now optional.
